column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Don't be stupid and come on a weekend if you're expecting a relaxing environment with no line. Come during the week if you can and take your time. If you do come on the weekend
column2: don't complain about long lines and rushed service. It's a different place then. During the week
column3: it's calm and relaxed and awesome. At this point
column4: I've eaten my way through most of the breakfast items. My favorites are the croissants
column6: and the scone with jam and butter. The coffee is underrated
column7: and a latte goes well with the sweet baked goods.
